dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3478 IH: Manned Aircraft Clarification Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McGuire introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to limit penalties relating to the destruction of aircraft to apply only with respect to manned aircraft, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Manned Aircraft Clarification Act.

section.header: Criminal penalties relating to manned aircraft

paragraph.text: Section 32 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the section heading, by inserting manned before aircraft or;

clause.text: by inserting manned before aircraft in the special aircraft jurisdiction; and
by inserting manned before civil; and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (b), by inserting manned before civil each place it appears.

paragraph.text: The table of sections for chapter 2 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking the item related to section 32 and inserting the following:

toc.toc-entry: 32. Destruction of manned aircraft or aircraft facilities.

subsection.text: Section 46502(a)(1)(A) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking an aircraft and inserting a manned aircraft.
